caption_languages: ภาษาอังกฤษ [อัตโนมัติ]
objectives_summary: Do you love salads? Do you eating healthy foods? Do you liek saving money? do you like eliminating preservatives and chemicals from your diet? If you answered YES to any of these questions then this course is for you!
I wan't each student to be able to fix a vinaigrette from scratch using ingredients sourced by the student
I want you to see the process of making oil and vinegar and then using these to make delicious vinaigrette and dressings.
